learning_objective: Prepare for an El Nido, Palawan trip with practical Filipino language skills

days.title: Welcome to El Nido!
days.focus: Airport arrival, first greetings, and basic transactions
days.learning_objective: Master polite greetings and basic transactions in Filipino
days.story_guidance: Focus on airport shop and van terminal interactions

days.title: At the Hotel
days.focus: Hotel check-in, room needs, and basic requests
days.learning_objective: Navigate hotel interactions and make basic location inquiries

days.title: Breakfast and Basic Needs
days.focus: Restaurant interactions, food ordering, and meal preferences
days.learning_objective: Order food confidently and navigate restaurant dining
